body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarDealz Customer Support. My name is Gary Young. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ruth. Can I have your phone number so we can assist you better?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, nine zero one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And could you also provide your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Ruth. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling confused about the warranty terms on my recent purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand. Let me look into that for you. Thank you for your patience, Ruth.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Ruth. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
